detaileddescription.para:
Initialize a counter
an initialized counter

briefdescription.para: Stop timing and accumulate tmr->{t_cpu, t_elapsed, t_tot_cpu, t_tot_elapsed}.
Reset tmr->{t_cpu, t_elapsed, t_tot_cpu, t_tot_elapsed} to 0.0.
Reset t_cpu, t_elapsed of all timer modules in array tmr[] to 0.0.

detaileddescription.para: The array should be terminated with a sentinel with .name = NULL.

briefdescription.para: Print t_cpu for all timer modules in tmr[], normalized by norm (i.e., t_cpu/norm).

detaileddescription.para: The array should be terminated with a sentinel with .name = NULL.
